content:
Our weekly podcast on the innovations, discoveries and gadgetry making the news

LEGISLATORS IN San Francisco have just voted to ban the use of facial recognition—is this a victory for privacy or a setback for technology? Also, new research on how machine learning can be used to predict the likelihood of breast cancer. And Amazon's boss, Jeff Bezos , draws inspiration from science fiction in his aim to build space habitats. Runtime: 21 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. [法] 立法者（legislator的复数形式）
n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
网络 小机件；小配件；小玩意儿
eg2: His desk is covered with electronic gadgetry.
他的书桌上摆满了各种电子玩意儿。

ex: n. 生境；栖息地；居住地；海底实验室人员居住的加压舱
网络 产地；栖地；自然环境
eg2: The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.
大熊猫的天然栖息地是竹林。
the destruction of wildlife habitat
野生动植物生存环境的破坏

ex: n. 识别；认识；承认；认可
eg2: He glanced briefly towards her but there was no sign of recognition.
他瞥了她一眼，但似乎没认出她来。
the automatic recognition of handwriting and printed text by computer
计算机对手写和印刷文本的自动识别
a growing recognition that older people have potential too
越来越多的人认识到老年人也是有潜力的
There is a general recognition of the urgent need for reform.
人们普遍认识到迫切需要改革。
to seek international/official/formal recognition as a sovereign state
寻求国际上的╱官方的╱正式的承认，承认它是一个主权国家
She gained only minimal recognition for her work.
她的工作仅仅得到极少的赞誉。
He received the award in recognition of his success over the past year.
他受到了奖励，这是对他过去一年的成绩的肯定。
It is an unexpected setback in her fortunes.
这是她好运中的一次意外的挫折。
One minor setback is nothing if you really want something and are willing to work for it.
如果你真的想要它，并且愿意为它付出，那么这一点小小的挫折不算什么。
Any storm would be a frustrating setback as the British energy giant may be within days of permanently plugging the well, which began leaking after a deadly explosion on April 20.
任何风暴对要在数天内对漏油井永久封盖的英国能源巨头来说都是令人沮丧的挫折，漏油开始于四月20日的致命性的爆炸之后。

Title: Saving face: San Francisco's ban on recognition technology
